ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DMT_N1_1138 : RNF - Results of Event Detection from the Neural Network
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains Demeter RNF - Results of Event Detection from the Neural Network
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
The DEMETER experiments are described in the special issue of Planetary and Space Science published in April 2006. We recommend the data users to contact the PI of the corresponding experiment early in their study.
An example of acknowledgments could be:
This work is based on observations with the neural network RNF embarked on the satellite DEMETER launched by CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales). The author thanks J.L. Pinçon the PI of this instrument for the use of the data, and CDPP (Centre des Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of these data.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI J.L. Pinçon, CNES and the CDPP (Centre des Données de la Physique des Plasmas) when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Results of Event Detection from the Neural Network
Parameter.Description: Results of Event detection from the onboard Neural Network. It consists of a neural network system dedicated to automatically identify and classify from ELF-VLF electric field measurements whistlers encountered by the satellite. Each whistler is identified and characterized onboard according to the dispersion paarameter (D).
